title: Incorrect enablement of 'Build' popup action
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user has selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user has selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when the user has not selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Verify that the 'Build' action is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective.
